skills.SkillDescribe:
Basic Attack
Yangayang performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG.

Heavy Attack
Yangyang consumes STA to lunge forward, dealing Aero DMG.

Heavy Attack: Zephyr Song
Use Basic Attack after Heavy Attack or Dodge Counter to perform Heavy Attack Zephyr Song, dealing Aero DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Yangyang consumes STA to perform a Plunging Attack from mid-air, dealing Aero DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to thrust forward, dealing Aero DMG.
Yangyang wields her sword to create a whirling vortex of winds that gathers nearby enemies to the center, dealing Aero DMG.
Yangyang conjures a mighty Cyclone that gathers nearby enemies, dealing Aero DMG.
Yangyang sends the target into the air, dealing Aero DMG.

Heavy Attack: Stormy Strike
When Yangyang has {0} Melodies, she can cast Stormy Strike after Heavy Attack or Dodge Counter, dealing Aero DMG.

Mid-air Attack: Feather Release
When Yangyang has {1} Melodies, cast Basic Attack in mid-air to consume all Melodies and perform consecutive strikes, diving from mid-air, dealing Aero DMG. As Yangyang lands, she sheathes her sword with an attack, dealing Aero DMG, considered as Basic Attack DMG.

Melody
Yangyang can hold up to {2} Melodies
Yangyang obtains {3} Melody with every Basic Attack 4 on hit.
Yangyang obtains {4} Melody for every Heavy Attack Zephyr Song on hit.
Yangyang obtains {5} Melody for every Resonance Skill Zephyr Domain on hit.
Yangyang obtains {6} Melody upon casting Intro Skill Cerulean Song.
Yangyang recovers {0} STA after she casts a Mid-air Attack Feather Release.
Yangyang's Aero DMG Bonus is increased by {0} for {1}s after casting Intro Skill Cerulean Song.
Yangyang recovers {0} Resonance Energy per second over {1}s for the incoming character (or a character on a nearby team that activates an Outro Skill).

Basic Attack
Chixia fires up to 4 consecutive shots, dealing Fusion DMG.

Heavy Attack
Chixia enters the aiming state for a more powerful shot.
The aimed shot fired after charging finishes deals Fusion DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Chixia consumes STA to perform consecutive shots at the target in mid-air, dealing Fusion DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

Chixia unleashes a flurry of shots, dealing Fusion DMG.

Whizzing Fight Spirit has 2 initial charges.
Chixia fires up fast shots at nearby enemies, dealing Fusion DMG.
Max "Thermobaric Bullets" is increased by {0} rounds. The damage of Resonance Skill Boom Boom is increased by {1}.
Each "Thermobaric Bullets" that hits a target during Resonance Skill DAKA DAKA! increases ATK by {0} for {1}s, stacking up to {2} times.
Chixia makes a heroic entrance and fires rapidly with her dual pistols at the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

Resonance Skill: DAKA DAKA!
Hold Resonance Skill Whizzing Fight Spirit to enter DAKA DAKA!. In this state:
- Chixia continuously consumes "Thermobaric Bullets" to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage;
Tap Basic Attack to cast Basic Attack 4, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Basic Attack damage. Then she exits the "DAKA DAKA!" state;
- If {0} "Thermobaric Bullets" have been fired when Basic Attack is activated, Chixia will cast Resonance Skill Boom Boom and terminate "DAKA DAKA!"
- Chixia exits the "DAKA DAKA!" state when all "Thermobaric Bullets" are consumed.

Resonance Skill: Boom Boom
Deal Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage.

Thermobaric Bullets
Chixia can hold up to {1} "Thermobaric Bullets".
Inherent Skill Scorching Magazine increases Max "Thermobaric Bullets" by {2}.
Chixia obtains "Thermobaric Bullets" for every Normal Attack POW POW on hit.
Chixia obtains "Thermobaric Bullets" upon casting Intro Skill Grand Entrance and Resonance Skill Whizzing Fight Spirit.
Chixia releases a shock wave surrounding the target, dealing Fusion DMG equal to {0} of Chixia's ATK to enemies within the range.

Basic Attack
Verina performs up to 5 consecutive attacks with vines, dealing Spectro DMG.

Heavy Attack
Verina consumes STA to charge forward, dealing Spectro DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Verina consumes STA to perform up to 3 consecutive attacks in mid-air, dealing Spectro DMG.

Mid-air Heavy Attack
Hold Basic Attack to consume STA and perform a mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing Spectro DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG.
Verina converges an energy field in front to grow foliage, dealing Spectro DMG within the range.

Verina nourishes nearby foliage at rapid speed, dealing Spectro DMG while healing all Characters on teams nearby. A Photosynthesis Mark is applied to the target on hit.

Photosynthesis Mark
Whenever a Character on a team nearby performs an attack on targets with a Photosynthesis Mark, Verina performs a Coordinated Attack, dealing Spectro DMG while healing the active Character dealing damage on a team nearby, triggered 1 time per second.
Verina protects a team member from fatal damage and grants a shield with strength equal to {0} of Verina's ATK, lasting for {1}s. This can be triggered 1 time every {2} minutes.
When Verina casts Heavy Attack Starflower Blooms, Mid-air Attack Starflower Blooms, Resonance Liberation Arboreal Flourish or Outro Skill Blossom, all team members' ATK are increased by {0} for {1}s.
Verina attacks the target, dealing Spectro DMG.

Heavy Attack: Starflower Blooms
When casting Heavy Attack, if Verina carries "Photosynthesis Energy", Verina consumes {0} stack of "Photosynthesis Energy" to recover Concerto Energy and heal all characters on a nearby team;
Heavy Attack: Starflower Blooms deals Spectro DMG, considered as Heavy Attack damage.

Mid-air Attack: Starflower Blooms
When casting Mid-air Attack, if Verina carries "Photosynthesis Energy", Verina consumes {0} stack of "Photosynthesis Energy" to recover Concerto Energy and heal all characters on a nearby team;
Mid-air Attack: Starflower Blooms deals Spectro DMG, considered as Basic Attack damage.
Verina can cast Mid-air Attack: Starflower Blooms by using Basic Attack after casting Heavy Attack: Starflower Blooms.

Photosynthesis Energy
Verina can hold up to {1} "Photosynthesis Energy".
Verina obtains {2} stack of "Photosynthesis Energy" for every Basic Attack 5 on hit;
Verina obtains {3} stack of "Photosynthesis Energy" for every Resonance Skill Botany Experiment on hit;
Verina obtains {4} stack of "Photosynthesis Energy" for every Intro Skill Verdant Growth on hit.
Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

Verina heals the incoming Resonator (or Resonator on a nearby team that activates this Outro Skill) by {0} of her ATK per second for {1}s. All Resonators on nearby teams have their DMG Amplified by {2} for {3}s.

Basic Attack
Rover performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Spectro DMG.

Heavy Attack
Rover consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG.

Heavy Attack: Resonance
After Basic Attack 3 or Heavy Attack, press the Basic Attack button at the right time to perform Heavy Attack Resonance, dealing Spectro DMG.

Heavy Attack: Aftertune
After Heavy Attack Resonance or Dodge Counter hits a target, press the Basic Attack button to perform Heavy Attack Aftertune, dealing Spectro DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Rover consumes STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Spectro DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG.
Rover launches an attack forward, dealing Spectro DMG.
Rover converges Spectro energy to assail the target area, detonating it after a short delay and dealing Spectro DMG.
Rover attacks the target, dealing Spectro DMG.
Generate an area of stasis surrounding the next character (or a character on a nearby team that activates an Outro Skill), lasting for {0}s.

skills.SkillName: World in a Grain of Sand
skills.SkillDescribe:
Resonance Skill: Resonating Spin
If "Diminutive Sound" exceeds {0} when Resonance Skill is used, Rover consumes {1} "Diminutive Sound" to cast Resonating Spin, dealing Spectro DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage.

Basic Attack: Resonating Echoes
After Resonance Skill Resonating Spin ends, Rover performs Resonating Echoes upon using Basic Attack button.
Launch attacks forward, dealing Spectro DMG, considered as Resonance Skill DMG.

Diminutive Sound
Rover can hold up to {2} "Diminutive Sounds".
Rover obtains "Diminutive Sound" for every Normal Attack Vibration Manifestation on hit.
Rover obtains "Diminutive Sound" for every Heavy Attack Aftertune on hit.
Rover obtains "Diminutive Sound" upon casting Intro Skill Waveshock.
DMG dealt by Rover's Basic Attack Resonating Echoes is increased by {0}.
Rover gains {0} ATK increase for {1}s upon casting Heavy Attack Resonance.
An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance

Basic Attack
Sanhua performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG.

Heavy Attack
Sanhua consumes STA to launch attacks, dealing Glacio DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Sanhua consumes STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Glacio DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.
Sanhua sends an air blade to create {0} "Ice Prism" on the ground, dealing Glacio DMG.
Sanhua deals Glacio DMG and creates {0} "Glacier".
Sanhua swings her blade downward and creates 1 "Ice Thorn", dealing Glacio DMG.
The incoming Resonator (or Resonator on a nearby team that activates Outro Skill) has their Basic Attack DMG Amplified by {0} for {1}s or until they are switched off field.

Heavy Attack: Detonate
When holding Basic Attack, a cursor moves back and forth on the Forte Gauge. Release Basic Attack while cursor falls in the "Frostbite" area, to perform Heavy Attack Detonate, dealing Glacio DMG considered as Heavy Attack damage.

Ice Burst
Sanhua’s Heavy Attack Detonate detonates all "Ice Thorns", "Ice Prisms" and "Glaciers" within her attack range, dealing Glacio DMG. Ice Burst deals Resonance Skill DMG.

Frostbite Area
The "Frostbite" area expands with every {0} stack of "Clarity". "Clarity" stacks up to {1} times.
Sanhua obtains {2} stack of "Clarity" upon performing Basic Attack 5.
Sanhua obtains {3} stack of "Clarity" upon casting Intro Skill Freezing Thorns.
Sanhua obtains {4} stack of "Clarity" upon casting Resonance Skill Eternal Frost.
Sanhua obtains {5} stack(s) of "Clarity" upon casting Resonance Liberation Glacial Gaze.
Upon casting Heavy Attack Detonate, all "Clarity" is removed.
Damage dealt by Sanhua's Resonance Skill increased by {0} for {1}s after casting her Intro Skill.
Damage dealt by Sanhua's Forte Circuit Ice Burst is increased by {0} for {1}s after casting Basic Attack 5.

Basic Attack
Taoqi performs up to 4 continuous attacks, dealing Havoc DMG.

Heavy Attack
Taoqi consumes STA to deal Havoc DMG.
If Basic Attack button is held, Taoqi enters Rocksteady Defense state.

Rocksteady Defense
Taoqi's DMG taken is reduced by {0};
-When Taoqi is attacked during Rocksteady Defense, she will cast Strategic Parry;
-Strategic Parry is automatically cast after Rocksteady Defense lasts for {1}s;
If Taoqi is attacked when casting Resonance Skill Rocksteady Shield, Strategic Parry is automatically cast.

Strategic Parry
Taoqi attacks the target, dealing Havoc DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Taoqi consumes STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Havoc DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG.

Taoqi deals Havoc DMG to surrounding targets, generating {0} Rocksteady Shield and healing herself.
If attacked when casting Fortified Defense, Strategic Parry will be automatically cast.

Rocksteady Shield
When the active character on the team is attacked, {1} Rocksteady Shield is consumed to reduce the damage taken.
Launch an attack based on Taoqi's DEF to the target, dealing Havoc DMG.
Attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG.
The incoming Resonator (or Resonator on a nearby team that activates Outro Skill) has their Resonance Skill DMG Amplified by {0} for {1}s or until they are switched off field.

Timed Counters
When carrying "Resolving Caliber", use Basic Attack after Heavy Attack Strategic Parry or Intro Skill Defense Formation to cast Timed Counters, performing up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing Havoc DMG, considered as Basic Attack damage.
Timed Counters consume {0} "Resolving Caliber" upon hitting an enemy to grant a shield.
After casting the Intro Skill Defense Formation, use Basic Attack to directly cast Timed Counters.

Resolving Caliber
Taoqi can hold up to {1} Resolving Caliber.
Basic Attack 4 will consume all of Taoqi's "Rocksteady Shields" to grant that many "Resolving Caliber".
While Rocksteady Shield exists, when the active character is attacked, {2} "Rocksteady Shield" will be consumed to recover "Resolving Caliber".
After Rocksteady Shield ends, all remaining "Rocksteady Shield" will be consumed to grant that many "Resolving Caliber".
While Resonance Skill Rocksteady Shield lasts, the Character's DEF is increased by {0}.
After Heavy Attack Strategic Parry is successfully triggered, {0} Stamina is recovered.

Basic Attack
Baizhi instructs You'tan to perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG.

Heavy Attack
Baizhi continuously consumes STA to command You'tan to attack enemies, dealing Glacio DMG. During Heavy Attack, Baizhi can command You'tan to move.

Mid-air Attack
Baizhi consumes STA and summons You’tan in mid-air to perform a Plunging Attack, dealing Glacio DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.
Baizhi calls You'tan to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG while immediately healing all characters on nearby teams.

Baizhi summons You'tan to heal all characters on nearby teams, generating {0} stacks of Remnant Entities.

Remnant Entities
Remnant Entities follow the active team members. {2} stacks of Remnant Entities are automatically consumed to attack the targets every {1}s, dealing Glacio DMG on hit while healing the active character on a nearby team.

When Baizhi casts Resonance Skill Emergency Plan, You'tan generates a field of Euphonia that lasts for {0}s.

Euphonia
ATK of the Resonators who picks up Euphonia is increased by {1} for {2}s.
Baizhi's Heavy Attack on hit heals the character with the lowest HP on a nearby team by {0} of her Max HP.
Baizhi calls You'tan to perform 1 plunging attack, dealing Glacio DMG while healing all characters on a nearby team.

Baizhi heals the incoming Resonator (or Resonator on a nearby team that activates Outro Skill) by {1} of her Max HP every {0}s for {2}s. The healed Resonator also has their Attribute DMG Amplified by {3} for {4}s.

You'tan
A Remnant Creature that answers to Baizhi’s mind and desires while sharing all her stats. You’tan goes back to Baizhi when Baizhi dodges.

Concentration
Baizhi consumes all "Concentrations" when casting Heavy Attack or Resonance Skill Emergency Plan to continuously heal all characters on nearby teams. Each {0} "Concentration" consumed provides 1 healing. The healings happen every {2}s.
When Baizhi consumes "Concentration" to cast Heavy Attack, Baizhi additionally restores Concerto Energy and Resonance Energy;
When Baizhi consumes "Concentration" to cast Resonance Skill Emergency Plan, Baizhi additionally restores Concerto Energy.

Forte Gauge: Concentration
Baizhi can hold up to {3} "Concentrations".
Baizhi obtains {4} "Concentration" for every Basic Attack on hit.
Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

Basic Attack
Encore performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Fusion DMG.

Basic Attack: Wooly Strike
After Basic Attack 4, press the Basic Attack button to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

Heavy Attack
Encore consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Encore consumes STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Fusion DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

Flaming Woolies
Encore summons Cloudy and Cosmos to attack with burning rays, dealing Fusion DMG.

Energetic Welcome
After casting Flaming Woolies, use Resonance Skill to perform Energetic Welcome, dealing Fusion DMG.

As Encore loses control, Cosmos breaks free and wreaks havoc on its surroundings.

Basic Attack: Cosmos - Frolicking
During Cosmos Rave, the Basic Attack is replaced with Cosmos - Frolicking, which performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Basic Attack damage.

Cosmos - Heavy Attack
During Cosmos Rave, the Heavy Attack is replaced with Cosmos - Heavy Attack, consuming STA to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Heavy Attack damage.

Resonance Skill: Cosmos - Rampage
During Cosmos Rave, Flaming Woolies is replaced with Cosmos - Rampage, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage.

Cosmos - Dodge Counter
During Cosmos Rave, use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Basic Attack damage.
Encore pounces at the enemies with Cosmos, dealing Fusion DMG.

Encore generates a Thermal Field centered around skill target, with a radius of {0}m. Targets inside the Thermal Field are continuously burned, suffering Fusion DMG equal to {2} of Encore's ATK every {1}s for {3}s.

Heavy Attack: Cloudy Frenzy
When Encore's "Mayhem" is full, after casting a Heavy Attack, Encore will consume all "Mayhem" to enter the Mayhem state, reducing damage taken by {0}. Switching Characters does not interrupt the Mayhem state.
After the Mayhem state ends, Encore will cast Cloudy Frenzy, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation damage.

Heavy Attack: Cosmos Rupture
During Cosmos Rave, when casting Heavy Attack, if "Mayhem" is full, Encore will consume all "Mayhem" to enter Cosmos' Mayhem state, reducing damage taken by {1}. Switching Characters does not interrupt the Cosmos' Mayhem state.
After Cosmos' Mayhem state ends, Encore will cast Cosmos Rupture, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation damage.
Mayhem
Encore can hold up to {2} "Mayhem".
When Normal Attack Wooly Attack hits a target, Encore restores "Mayhem".
When Resonance Skill Flaming Woolies hits a target, Encore restores "Mayhem".
When Resonance Skill Energetic Welcome hits a target, Encore restores "Mayhem".
When Intro Skill Woolies Helpers hits a target, Encore restores "Mayhem".
During the duration of Resonance Liberation Cosmos Rave, Encore restores "Mayhem" when hitting a target.
During the Resonance Liberation Cosmos Rave, when Encore's HP is above {0}, DMG dealt is increased by {1}.
When Resonance Skill Flaming Woolies or Resonance Skill Cosmos - Rampage is cast, Encore's Fusion DMG Bonus is increased by {0} for {1}s.
Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

Basic Attack
Danjin performs up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing Havoc DMG.

Heavy Attack
Danjin consumes STA to launch consecutive attacks, dealing Havoc DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Consume STA to perform a Mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing Havoc DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to launch an attack, dealing Havoc DMG.

Dodge Counter: Ruby Shades
After a successful Dodge Counter, Danjin can use Resonance Skill Crimson Fragment to perform Resonance Skill: Crimson Erosion.

When casting Crimson Fragment, each attack consumes {0} of Danjin's max HP. When Danjin's HP is less than {1}, this no longer consumes HP.

Carmine Gleam
Danjin attacks the target, dealing Havoc DMG.

Crimson Erosion
After Basic Attack 2, Dodge Counter or Intro Skill Vindication, use Resonance Skill to perform up to 2 consecutive strikes, dealing Havoc DMG.
When Crimson Erosion 2 hits a target, apply Incinerating Will to it.

Incinerating Will
Danjin's damage dealt to targets marked with Incinerating Will is increased by {2}.

Sanguine Pulse
Use Resonance Skill after Basic Attack 3 to perform up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing Havoc DMG.
Danjin's anger intensifies as she frantically swings her dual blades, performing multiple rapid consecutive attacks, and {0} Scarlet Burst attack(s), dealing Havoc DMG.
With unwavering determination, Danjin unleashes a strike, dealing Havoc DMG.
The incoming Resonator (or Resonator on a nearby team that activates Outro Skill) has their Havoc DMG Amplified by {0} for {1}s or until they are switched off field.

Heavy Attack: Chaoscleave
After accumulating {0} "Ruby Blossom", long press Basic Attack to consume all "Ruby Blossom" to cast Chaoscleave, dealing Havoc DMG, considered as Heavy Attack damage, and healing Danjin.
If current "Ruby Blossom" reaches over {1}, {2} "Ruby Blossom" is consumed instead to increase the DMG multiplier of Chaoscleave and Scatterbloom performed this time.

Heavy Attack: Scatterbloom
Use Basic Attack after Heavy Attack Chaoscleave to cast Scatterbloom to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG, considered as Heavy Attack damage.

Ruby Blossom
Danjin can hold up to {3} Ruby Blossom.
Danjin obtains "Ruby Blossom" when using Resonance Skill Crimson Fragment.
Damage of Resonance Skill Crimson Erosion triggered by Dodge Counter: Ruby Shades is increased by {0}. The HP cost and stacks of "Ruby Blossom" recovered are doubled.
After casting the Resonance Skill Sanguine Pulse, Danjin's Heavy Attack damage is increased by {0} for {1}s.
Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

Basic Attack
Aalto fires up to 5 consecutive shots, dealing Aero DMG. Basic Attack 4 will spread the "Mist" forward, which lasts for {0}s.

Heavy Attack
Aalto enters the aiming state for a more powerful shot.
The aimed shot fired after charging finishes deals Aero DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Aalto consumes STA to perform consecutive shots at the target in mid-air, dealing Aero DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

Mist Avatar
Casts "Mist" and {0} "Mist Avatar(s)" to taunt the surrounding targets. The avatars inherit a portion of Aalto's HP and generate {1} Mist Bullets around them, dealing Aero DMG.

Mist Bullets
Deals Aero DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage.
Generate a "Gate of Quandary" in front, dealing Aero DMG. When bullets pass through the "Gate of Quandary", they deal increased DMG. "Gate of Quandary" lasts for {0}s.
Aalto shows up out of thin air to perform rapid continuous shooting, dealing Aero DMG.
The incoming Resonator (or Resonator on a nearby team that activates Outro Skill) has their Aero DMG Amplified by {0} for {1}s or until they are switched off field.

When Aalto passes through "Mist" or "Gate of Quandary", he enters the Mistcloak Dash.

Mistcloak Dash
-Movement speed increased;
-During this period, "Mist Drops" are continuously consumed, and for each {0} "Mist Drop" consumed, {1} Mist Bullet(s) is generated.

Mist Drops
Aalto can hold up to {2} "Mist Drops".
When Basic Attack or Mid-air Attack passes through "Mist" and hits the target, {3} "Mist Drop" is recovered.
Aalto's Heavy Attack will always critically hit, triggered once every {0}s.
Aalto will continuously recover Stamina when he is in the Forte Circuit Miscloak Dash state.

Basic Attack
Jiyan performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG.

Heavy Attack
Jiyan consumes STA to thrust forward, dealing Aero DMG.

Heavy Attack: Windborne Strike
Hold the Basic Attack during Heavy Attack to cast Windborne Strike after the Heavy Attack ends, dealing Aero DMG.

Heavy Attack: Abyssal Slash
Release the Basic Attack during the Heavy Attack to cast Abyssal Slash after the Heavy Attack ends, dealing Aero DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Jiyan consumes STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Aero DMG.
After the Plunging Attack, use Basic Attack to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Aero DMG.

Mid-air Attack: Banner of Triumph
After casting the Heavy Attack Windborne Strike or the Resonance Skill Windqueller in the air, Jiyan can perform a mid-air attack, dealing Aero DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use a Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

Dash forward a certain distance, dealing Aero DMG.

Can be cast in the air.

After releasing Emerald Storm - Prelude, Jiyan enters Qingloong Mode.

Qingloong Mode
Jiyan has increased resistance to interruption;
Basic Attack, Heavy Attack and Dodge Counter are replaced with Heavy Attack Lance of Qingloong.

Heavy Attack: Lance of Qingloong
Perform up to 3 continuous attacks, dealing Aero DMG, considered as Heavy Attack damage.
Jiyan pierces the target in mid-air, dealing Aero DMG.

When the incoming character's (or a character on a nearby team that activates an Outro Skill) Heavy Attack hits a target, Jiyan will summon Qingloong to launch a Coordinated Attack, dealing Aero DMG equal to {0} of Jiyan's ATK. This attack lasts for {1}s and can be triggered once every {2}s, up to 2 times.

When casting Resonance Skill Windqueller, if Jiyan has {0} or more "Resolve", he consumes {1} "Resolve" to increase the DMG of this Resonance Skill Windqueller by {2}.
When Jiyan is in Qingloong Mode, DMG of Resonance Skill Windqueller is increased by {3} and no longer consumes "Resolve".

Resonance Liberation: Emerald Storm - Finale
When casting Resonance Liberation Emerald Storm - Prelude, if Jiyan has {4} "Resolve" or more, he will consume {5} "Resolve" to cast Emerald Storm - Finale, dealing Aero DMG, considered as Heavy Attack damage.
Emerald Storm: Finale can be cast in mid-air at low altitude.

Resolve
Jiyan can hold up to {6} Resolve.
Jiyan gains "Resolve" when his Normal Attack Lone Lance hits the target.
Jiyan gains "Resolve" when the Intro Skill Tactical Strike hits the target.
"Resolve" will gradually decrease if Jiyan does not hit a target within {7}s.
After casting the Intro Skill Tactical Strike, Jiyan's ATK is increased by {0} for {1}s.
When Jiyan's attacks hit a target, Jiyan's Crit. DMG is increased by {0} for {1}s.

Basic Attack
Mortefi uses his dual pistols and flames to perform up to 4 consecutive shots, dealing Fusion DMG.

Heavy Attack
Mortefi enters the aiming state for a more powerful shot.
The aimed shot fired after charging finishes deals Fusion DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Mortefi consumes STA to perform consecutive shots at the target in mid-air, dealing Fusion DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.
Launch a flashing lightning of flames forward, dealing Fusion DMG.

Deal Fusion DMG, and apply Burning Rhapsody to all characters on the team.

Burning Rhapsody
When the active character's Basic Attack hits the target, Mortefi launches a Coordinated Attack, firing {0} Marcato.
When the active character's Heavy Attack hits the target, Mortefi launches a Coordinated Attack, firing {1} Marcato.
Mortefi can launch one Coordinated Attack every {2}s.

Marcato
Deals Fusion DMG.
After casting Resonance Skill Passionate Variation, the damage of Resonance Skill Fury Fugue is increased by {1} for {0}s.

During Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody, each hit of Resonance Liberation Marcato will increase the DMG of the next Resonance Liberation Marcato by {0}, which can be triggered once every {1}s, stacking up to {2} times.
The effect will be reset after Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody ends.
Attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.
The incoming Resonator (or Resonator on a nearby team that activates Outro Skill) has their Heavy Attack DMG Amplified by {0} for {1}s or until they are switched off field.

Resonance Skill: Fury Fugue
When Mortefi's "Annoyance" reaches {0}, his Resonance Skill is replaced with Fury Fudge.
When casting Fury Fudge, Mortefi consumes all "Annoyance" to unleash high-speed flame lightning, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage.

Annoyance
Mortefi can hold up to {1} Annoyance.
When Normal Attack Impromptu Show hits the target, “Annoyance” is restored.
When Intro Skill Dissonance hits the target, “Annoyance” is restored.
When Resonance Skill Passionate Variation hits the target, “Annoyance” is restored.
Within {2}s after casting Passionate Variation, Basic Attack Impromptu Show that hits the target additionally restores “Annoyance”.

Basic Attack
Calcharo performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG.

Heavy Attack
Consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Consumes STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Electro DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

Calcharo performs up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
If Calcharo is switched off field, or if Resonance Skill Extermination Order is not activated again in a while, this skill will enter Cooldown.
Resonance Skill Extermination Order does not interrupt Calcharo's Basic Attack cycle.

Calcharo attacks the target, dealing Electro DMG and enters Deathblade Gear state. After Deathblade Gear state ends, Calcharo's next Intro Skill is replaced with Intro Skill "Necessary Means", which deals Electro DMG, considered as Intro Skill damage.

Deathblade Gear
-Basic Attack is replaced with Basic Attack Hounds Roar;
-Heavy Attack deals increased DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation DMG;
-Dodge Counter deals increased DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation DMG.

Basic Attack: Hounds Roar
Calcharo performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Basic Attack Damage.
When casting Heavy Attack "Mercy", Calcharo's Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus is increased by {0} for {1}s.
When Heavy Attack "Death Messenger" hits the target, the damage taken by Calcharo is reduced by {0} for {1}s.
Attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.
Calcharo summons Phantom to support the active Resonator, clearing the targets in front with a slash. The Phantom's attack deals Electro DMG equal to {0} of Calcharo's ATK.

Heavy Attack: "Mercy"
When Calcharo has {0} "Cruelty", his Heavy Attack is replaced with Heavy Attack "Mercy".
When casting Heavy Attack "Mercy", Calcharo consumes {1} "Cruelty" to deal Electro DMG, considered as Heavy Attack damage, and recovers Resonance Energy and Concerto Energy.

"Cruelty"
Calcharo can hold up to {2} "Cruelty".
Under Resonance Liberation Deathblade Gear state, "Cruelty" cannot be acquired.
When Resonance Skill Extermination Order hits the target, gain {3} "Cruelty".

Heavy Attack: "Death Messenger"
When Calcharo has {4} "Killing Intent", his Basic Attack is replaced with Heavy Attack "Death Messenger".
When casting Heavy Attack "Death Messenger", Calcharo consumes {5} "Killing Intent" to deal Electro DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation damage, and recovers Resonance Energy and Concerto Energy.

"Killing Intent"
Under Resonance Liberation Deathblade Gear state, Calcharo's Forte Gauge is replaced with "Killing Intent", stacking up to {6}.
When Basic Attack Hounds Roar hits the target, Calcharo gains 1 "Killing Intent".
Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

Basic Attack
Yinlin controls the puppet "Zapstring" to perform up to 4 attacks, dealing Electro DMG.

Heavy Attack
Yinlin consumes STA to control "Zapstring", dealing Electro DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Yinlin consumes STA to control "Zapstring" to perform a Mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing Electro DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

Magnetic Roar
The puppet "Zapstring" deals Electro DMG to the target, and puts Yinlin in Resonance Skill Execution Mode.

Execution Mode
Basic Attack and Dodge Counter will trigger 1 Electromagnetic Blast when hitting a target.
Each stage of Basic Attack or Dodge Counter can only trigger 1 Electromagnetic Blast, up to 4 times.

Electromagnetic Blast
Attack all targets marked with Forte Circuit Sinner's Mark, dealing Electro DMG.

Lightning Execution
Use Resonance Skill after casting Resonance Skill Magnetic Roar to cast Lightning Execution to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.
If Resonance Skill Lightning Execution is not activated in a while or this Character is switched, this Skill will be put on Cooldown.
Command "Zapstring" to call for thunder to fall upon a large range, dealing Electro DMG.
Command puppet "Zapstring" to attack, dealing Electro DMG in a large range.

The incoming Resonator (or Resonator on a nearby team that activates Outro Skill) has their Electro DMG Amplified by {0} and Resonance Liberation DMG Amplified by {1} for {2}s or until they are switched off field.

Chameleon Cipher
When Yinlin's "Judgment Points" is full, her Heavy Attack is replaced with Chameleon Cipher, which consumes all "Judgment Points" to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG. When it hits a target marked with Sinner's Mark, the Sinner's Mark is replaced with Punishment Mark, lasting for {0}s.

Sinner's Mark
Basic Attack Zapstring's Dance, Resonance Liberation Thundering Wrath, and Intro Skill Roaring Storm will apply Sinner's Mark on hit.
Sinner's Mark is removed when Yinlin exits.

"Punishment Mark"
When a target marked with Punishment Mark is damaged, Judgement Strike will fall, dealing Electro DMG to all targets marked with Punishment Mark. This can be triggered up to once per second.

Judgment Points
Yinlin can hold up to {1} Judgement Points.
When Normal Attack Zapstring's Dance hits a target, restore "Judgment Points".
When casting Resonance Skill Magnetic Roar hits a target, restore "Judgment Points".
When Resonance Skill Electromagnetic Blast hits a target, restores "Judgment Points".
When casting Resonance Skill Magnetic Roar hits a target, restore "Judgment Points".
After using Resonance Skill Magnetic Roar, Yinlin's Crit. Rate is increased by {0} for {1}s.
The damage of Resonance Skill Lightning Execution is increased by {0} when hitting targets marked with Sinner's Mark, and Yinlin's ATK is increased by {1} for {2}s when this is triggered.

Basic Attack
Lingyang performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG.

Basic Attack: Feral Roars
After Resonance Skill Furious Punches is cast, Basic Attack 5 is replaced with Feral Roars, dealing Glacio DMG.

Heavy Attack
Lingyang consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Lingyang consumes STA to perform a Mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing Glacio DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.

Ancient Arts
Attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.

Furious Punches
When Basic Attacks 3, 4, or 5 or Basic Attack Feral Roars hits the target, Resonance Skill Ancient Arts is replaced with Resonance Skill Furious Punches.
Lingyang's Basic Attack cycle starts from Basic Attack 3 after casting Basic Attack Feral Roars and Resonance Skill Furious Punches in turn.

Lingyang's Resonance Skill does not reset his Basic Attack cycle.

Attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG, and receive the blessing of Lion's Vigor.

Lion's Vigor
Lingyang's Glacio DMG Bonus is increased by {0};
DMG of the Intro Skill Lion Awakens is increased by {0}.

Under the Forte Circuit Striding Lion state, within {0}s after each Basic Attack, the next Forte Circuit Mountain Roamer will deal an additional Glacio DMG, equal to {1} of Mountain Roamer damage, considered as Resonance Skill damage.
Lingyang enters the battlefield, dealing Glacio DMG.
Lingyang releases a shock wave centered on the skill target, dealing Glacio DMG equal to {0} of Lingyang's ATK to targets within the range.

Heavy Attack: Glorious Plunge
When "Lion's Spirit" is full, use Heavy Attack to perform Glorious Plunge, dealing Glacio DMG.

Mid-air Attack: Tail Strike
When "Lion's Spirit" is not full, use Basic Attack after Heavy Attack to perform Tail Strike, dealing Glacio DMG.

Striding Lion
After casting Heavy Attack Glorious Plunge, enter Striding Lion state;
After casting Intro Skill Lion Awakens or Resonance Liberation Strive: Lion's Vigor, if "Lion's Spirit" is full, use Basic Attack to enter Striding Lion state.
In the Striding Lion state:
-Attacks can be launched in mid-air. If Lingyang is on the ground, use Heavy Attack Glorious Plunge to get back in the air.
-"Lion's Spirit" is continuously consumed before running out in {0}s, and when it runs out, Striding Lion ends;
- If Lingyang is in the Resonance Liberation Lion's Vigor state, the consumption speed of "Lion's Spirit" is reduced by {1}, extending Striding Lion state by up to {2}s.
-Lingyang's Basic Attack is replaced with Basic Attack Feral Gyrate, which performs up to 2 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG;
-Lingyang's Resonance Skill is replaced with Mountain Roamer, dealing Glacio DMG;
-When "Lion's Spirit" is less than {3}, use Basic Attack to perform Stormy Kicks, dealing Glacio DMG; after performing Basic Attack Stormy Kicks, the Mid-air Attack Tail Strike becomes available.
Concerto Energy is restored when "Lion's Spirit" is consumed.

Lion's Spirit
Lingyang can hold up to {4} "Lion's Spirit".
When casting Resonance Skill Furious Punches, "Lion's Spirit" is restored.
When casting Intro Skill Lion Awakens, "Lion's Spirit" is restored.
When casting Resonance Liberation Strive: Lion's Vigor, "Lion's Spirit" is restored.
Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

Basic Attack
Yuanwu performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG.

Heavy Attack
Yuanwu consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Yuanwu consumes STA to launch a Mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing Electro DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

Thunder Wedge
Yuanwu summons Thunder Wedge, dealing Electro DMG, and forms a Thunder Field centered on the Thunder Wedge. Thunder Wedge lasts for {0}s.
Forte Circuit Rumbling Spark and Resonance Liberation Blazing Might will immediately detonate Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge on the field, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Resonance Skill Damage.

Thunder Field
The active character gains the effects below when in the Thunder Field: a Coordinated Attack from Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge is triggered when attacks hit a target, dealing Electro DMG. This can be triggered once every {1}s. The effect lasts for {2}s.
Awaken the power of thunder and provide Forte Circuit Lightning Infused status to all characters on a nearby team for {0}s, then perform a powerful blow that deals Electro DMG.
The DMG multiplier of Resonance Skill Thunder Uprising is increased by {0}, and its reduction efficiency of enemy Vibration Strength is enhanced.

The ranges of the Resonance Skills Thunder Field and Thunder Uprising are greatly expanded. When exiting during combat, if "Readiness" is not full, Yuanwu will automatically leave {0} Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge in place.
Attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.
Yuanwu unleashes thunderbolts in an area centered around the skill target, greatly reducing the Vibration Strength of enemies upon impact.

Rumbling Spark
When "Readiness" is full, long press Resonance Skill to consume all "Readiness" and cast Rumbling Spark, dealing Electro DMG and entering the Lightning Infused state.

Thunder Uprising
When "Readiness" is full, Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge will be replaced with Thunder Uprising, dealing Electro DMG.

Lightning Infused
The character in Lightning Infused state has a greatly increased resistance to interruption.
When Yuanwu is in this state:
-Basic Attacks: Hit targets in a larger range, reduce enemy Vibration Strength with increased efficiency;
-Heavy Attacks: Have increased attack speed, reduce enemy Vibration Strength with increased efficiency;
-Dodge Counters: Have increased attack speed, reduce enemy Vibration Strength with increased efficiency.
-Use Basic Attack within {0}s after casting a Heavy Attack or a successful Counterattack to cast Thunderweaver, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Basic Attack damage;
-Does not recover "Readiness".

Readiness
Yuanwu can hold up to {1} "Readiness".
When Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge is on the field, Yuanwu gains {2} "Readiness" every second, even when he is not the active character;
When Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge hits a target with a Coordinated Attack, Yuanwu gains {3} "Readiness".
Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

Basic Attack
Rover-Havoc performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Havoc DMG.

Heavy Attack
Rover-Havoc consumes STA to attack, dealing Havoc DMG.
Use Basic Attack after casting Heavy Attack to cast Basic Attack 4.

Mid-air Attack
Rover-Havoc consumes STA to cast a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Havoc DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG.
Transform sound into feathers, dealing Havoc DMG.
Rover gathers resonating sounds to attack a target, dealing Havoc DMG.
Attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG.
Rover summons a Havoc Field, dealing Havoc DMG of {1} of Rover's ATK to all targets within the range every {0}s for {2}s.

Devastation
When "Umbra" is full, hold Basic Attack to cast Devastation to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG, considered as Heavy Attack damage.

Dark Surge
After casting Devastation, Rover enters the Dark Surge state. In this state:
Basic Attack is replaced with Enhanced Basic Attack, which performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Havoc DMG;
Heavy Attack is replaced with Enhanced Heavy Attack;
Use Basic Attack after casting Enhanced Heavy Attack to cast Heavy Attack Thwackblade to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG, considered as Heavy Attack damage;
Use Basic Attack after casting Heavy Attack Thwackblade to cast Enhanced Basic Attack 3 to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG;
Resonance Skill Wingblade is replaced with Resonance Skill Lifetaker, transforming sounds into blades to attack the target, dealing Havoc DMG.

Umbra
Rover can hold up to 100 points of Umbra.
Normal Attack Tuneslayer recovers Umbra on hit.
Resonance Skill Wingblade recovers Umbra when cast.
Resonance Skill Lifetaker recovers Umbra when cast.
Intro Skill Instant of Annihilation recovers Umbra when cast.
In the Dark Surge state, Havoc DMG Bonus is increased by {0}.
While in the Dark Surge state, Basic Attack recovers {0} extra Resonance Energy when it hits a target, and this effect can be triggered 1 time per second.

Basic Attack
Jianxin performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG.

Heavy Attack
Jianxin consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Jianxin consumes STA to plunge and unleash a powerful kick, dealing Aero DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

Hold Resonance Skill to enter Parry Stance.

Chi Counter
When Jianxin is attacked in the Parry Stance, she does not take damage and immediately performs Chi Counter, dealing Aero DMG.

Chi Parry
Release the Resonance Skill button during Parry Stance to interrupt Parry Stance and perform Chi Parry, dealing Aero DMG.

Create a strong wind field, continuously pulling targets within the wind field to the center and dealing Aero DMG. When the wind field disappears, it will trigger an explosion to deal Aero DMG to all targets within the range again.
Damage of Resonance Liberation Purification Force Field is increased by {0}.
The Shield obtained with Heavy Attack Primordial Chi Spiral is increased by {0}.
Pull in targets within the range, dealing Aero DMG.
The incoming character (or a character on a nearby team that activates Outro Skill) has their Resonance Liberation DMG Amplified by {0} for {1}s or until they are switched off field.

Heavy Attack: Primordial Chi Spiral
When "Chi" reaches max stacks, hold Heavy Attack to cast Primordial Chi Spiral and start Zhoutian Progress.

Zhoutian Progress
Jianxin's resistance to interruption is increased, and her the damage taken is reduced by {0}:
Jianxin continuously consumes "Chi" and casts Chi Strike to attack targets nearby, dealing Aero DMG.
As Zhoutian Progress accumulates, Jianxin reaches different Zhoutian and gain effects accordingly.
-Before Minor Zhoutian: Gain Zhoutian Progress 1 shield. When Zhoutian Progress is interrupted, cast Pushing Punch to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.
-Minor Zhoutian: Gain Zhoutian Progress 2 shield and cast Shock to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG. When Zhoutian Progress is interrupted, cast Yielding Pull to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.
-Major Zhoutian - Inner: Gain Zhoutian Progress 3 shield and cast Shock to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG. When Zhoutian Progress is interrupted, cast Yielding Pull to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.
-Major Zhoutian - Outer: Gain Zhoutian Progress 3 shield and cast Shock to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.
-When Basic Attack button is released, interrupt Zhoutian Progress and lose all "Chi";
-When all "Chi" is consumed, end Zhoutian Progress.

When Zhoutian Progress ends, regain a shield according to the Zhoutian Progress reached;
As the shield provided by Heavy Attack: Primordial Chi Spiral persists, the active character is healed once every {1}s.

Chi
Jianxin can hold up to {2} Chi.
Chi is obtained when Normal Attack Fengyiquan hits the target.
Chi is obtained when the Resonance Skill Calming Air is cast.
Chi is obtained when the Resonance Skills Chi Counter or Chi Parry hits the target.
Chi is obtained when the Intro Skill Essence of Tao hits the target.
